crac.controllers

Class ProjectController

  • java.lang.Object
    • crac.controllers.ProjectController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/project")
public class ProjectController
extends java.lang.Object
    REST controller for managing projects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProjectController()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> addTask(java.lang.String json, java.lang.Long project_id)
      Creates a task, that is set as the child of the chosen existing project
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> create(java.lang.String json)
      POST / or blank -> create a new project, creator is the logged-in user.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> destroy(java.lang.Long id)
      DELETE /{project_id} -> delete the task with given ID.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> index()
      GET / or blank -> get all tasks.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> removeTask(java.lang.Long project_id, java.lang.Long task_id)  
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> show(java.lang.Long id)
      GET /{project_id} -> get the project with given ID.
      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> update(java.lang.String json, java.lang.Long id)
      PUT /{project_id} -> update the task with given ID.
